prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of an (intense muscular man:1.2), short rigid spiky dark hair, fierce arrogant expression, realistic masculine facial features, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, (visible sweat and battle grime:1.2), individual hair strands, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching segmented armor texture:1.3), sharp focus, cinematic dramatic lighting, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, smooth skin, airbrushed, low quality, (bright yellow hair:1.3), (long hair:1.2), friendly
